body_html:
Two more updates. I instrumented crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc to printout compiler flags it get, used for cpu compilation and gpu compilation and did a build with -s option, generating around 140k line log file. Some early observations

  • For some reason only part of the files get --copt options
  • If these options are passed to cuda compilation, they are ignored, as was expected from the code.
    Tinkering more.

For some reason only part of the files get --copt options
If these options are passed to cuda compilation, they are ignored, as was expected from the code.
Tinkering more.
body:
Two more updates. I instrumented crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc to printout compiler flags it get, used for cpu compilation and gpu compilation and did a build with -s option, generating around 140k line log file. Some early observations
- For some reason only part of the files get --copt options
- If these options are passed to cuda compilation, they are ignored, as was expected from the code.
Tinkering more.
